list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: bounce back through the air after hitting a hard surface or object.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his shot hammered into the post and rebounded across the goal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cú sút của anh ta đập vào bài viết và hồi phục qua khung thành

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: past and past participle of rebind.
(in sporting contexts) a ball or shot that bounces back after striking a hard surface.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he blasted the rebound into the net
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta nổ tung sự phục hồi vào lưới
